default-notification.title: Unknown error occured
default-notification.notification: Please contact with the development team to resolve the issue.

400.title: Bad Request
400.message: The server couldn't process your request due to client error. Please check your input and try again.
400.notification: Your request could not be processed due to an error. Please verify your input and try again.

variants.title: Session expired
variants.notification: Please log in to the panel again.

401.title: Unauthorized
401.message: You are not authorized to access this resource. If you were previously logged in, your session may have expired. Please log in again to continue.
401.notification: You are not authorized to access this resource. Please log in to continue.

403.title: Access Denied
403.message: Your account doesn't have the necessary permissions to access this resource. Please check your user group membership.
403.notification: Your account doesn't have the necessary permissions to access this resource.

404.title: Page Not Found
404.message: The page you are trying to access doesn't exist. Check the URL or contact the development team if you believe this is an error.
404.notification: The page you are looking for could not be found. Please check the URL or contact the development team.

408.title: Request Timeout
408.message: The server timed out while waiting for your request.
408.notification: The server timed out while waiting for your request.

409.title: Duplicate error
409.message: A conflict occurred because a resource with the same name already exists.
409.notification: Resource with this name already exists.

410.title: Resource Gone
410.message: The resource you're trying to access has been permanently removed. Contact the development team if you need further assistance.
410.notification: The resource you are looking for is no longer available. Contact the development team if you need help.

418.title: I'm a Teapot
418.message: This server is a teapot, not a coffee maker. Please direct your request to a coffee-capable server.
418.notification: This server is a teapot, not equipped to handle your request. Try a different server.

429.title: Too Many Requests
429.message: You've made too many requests in a short time. Please wait before trying again.
429.notification: You have exceeded the request limit. Please slow down and try again after a short wait.

500.title: Something bad has happened
500.message: API service encountered an issue and couldn't complete your request. Please try refreshing the page.
500.notification: API service could not handle the request because of an internal issue.

503.title: Service unavailable
503.message: API service is either not responding or unreachable. Please ensure a proper connection to the API service.
503.notification: API service is either down or unreachable.

600.title: Something bad has happened
600.message: An internal issue in the web application has occured. Please contact with the development team to resolve it.
